alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:00PM MDT until June 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTY... At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summerset, or 10 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Hail up to ping pong ball size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth Air Force Base and northern Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 43 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
